articles.title: Blunt in the middle - India have a bowling problem to solve - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: India were in winning positions in the first two ODIs in Bangladesh, but their second-string bowling attack could not land that knockout punch
articles.content: Shardul Thakur is India's top wicket-taker in the middle overs since 2020, but he was wicketless on Wednesday  •  AFP via Getty Images
